attributes.action: ensure that until there is competition in the provision of basic telephone line service other than by BT the price is controlled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the only alternative to BT Line provision for basic telephone rental is the cable company, which does not sell this as a separate service, or is nationwide.
But Oftel allow increases in the cost of rental and changes in terms and conditions which effect over 26 Million peope without any restrictions.
Other service providers insist that you have and pay BT to provide a line as the only UK wide provider, without which they will not supply you with broadband etc.
BT have been allowed to increase line rental and move everyone to a monthly plan (even if paid quarterly), and now plan to charge people that do not want to do Direct Debit or Loan them money (Monthly credit plan) £4.50 a quarter from May 2007.
This is even if they already pay by the most efficent way (Electronic Bank transfer).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
